video.title: Beetleborgs
video.synopsis: When three teens free a spirit that offers to grant each a wish, they choose to become their favorite superheroes, launching a series of adventures.

episodes.synopsis: Drew, Jo and Roland are hanging out at Zoom Comics when local bullies Van and Trip dare them to go into the old abandoned Hillhurst House.
episodes.title: Beetle Rock: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Flabber grants the kids their wish to become Beetleborgs, he accidentally unleashes the comic book villains, too.
episodes.title: Beetle Rock: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Trip and Van learn that everyone knows they were too scared to go into the Hillhurst House, so they have a wrecking crew tear it down.
episodes.title: TNT for Two

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Buster Zapper plans to go to the Hillhurst House with his phasm blaster, while Jara, Noxic and Typhus summon Terror Bear from the comic book.
episodes.title: The Ghost Is Toast

episodes.synopsis: Flabber is sick, and when Drew, Jo and Roland go to check on him, they discover that his handkerchief is a treasure map.
episodes.title: The Treasure of Hillhurst Mansion

episodes.synopsis: Wolfgang bursts into Zoom Comics and upsets everyone. The Magnavors lure him back to the tomb, where Vexor asks him to help rid of the Beetleborgs.
episodes.title: Never Cry Werewolf

episodes.synopsis: Roland is having trouble with his magic tricks, so Flabber lends him a book of magic words. When Roland loses the book, Trip and Van cause trouble.
episodes.title: Say the Magic Word

episodes.synopsis: A film crew decides to use the Hillhurst House for a shoot. When the director discovers Graxxis in the house, he assumes he's an actor.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Too Much Action

episodes.synopsis: Vexor pulls a charm from the comic book that will make whoever sees it the slave of the person wearing it. He plans to send it to the Beetleborgs.
episodes.title: Nano in the House

episodes.synopsis: Nano's train is destined for destruction, but the Beetleborgs must first chase Garganturat, who wants to kidnap Heather into the comic book.
episodes.title: Locomotion Commotion

episodes.synopsis: When Fire Kat is pulled out of the comic by the Magnavors, he is far less ferocious than they hoped, so they decide to give him some lessons.
episodes.title: Cat-tastrophy

episodes.synopsis: When Heather sees a beautiful necklace on evil sorceress Queen Magna in the latest comic, Drew decides to get it for her on her birthday.
episodes.title: Drew and Flabber's Less than Fabulous Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Jara, Noxic and Typhus create a beautiful monster named Monsterella to charm the residents of Hillhurst into revealing the comic book mystery.
episodes.title: Ghouls Just Wanna Have Fun

episodes.synopsis: Jo drinks some "bad" soda and turns into "Mr. Hyde." She overturns tables and destroys the restaurant then bursts into Zoom Comics.
episodes.title: It's a Bad, Bad, Bad, Bad World

episodes.synopsis: After Nano and Aaron tell the kids the legend of the Hunchback of Hillhurst, they run into a slightly forgetful hunchback named Quincy Modo.
episodes.title: The Hunchback of Hillhurst

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Jo's cousin Oliver is the biggest Beetleborg fan ever. When Oliver wears his Beetleborg costume out to play, the Magnavors take him hostage.
episodes.title: The Littlest Brattleborg

episodes.synopsis: As Nano is about to make a deposit at the Charterville Bank, two bank robbers take her money and run -- straight into the Hillhurst House.
episodes.title: Haunted Hideout

episodes.synopsis: Nano meets a famous rock band that is in Charterville to make a record, and Trip suggests they rehearse at the Hillhurst House.
episodes.title: Monster Rock

episodes.synopsis: The kids dress as Beetleborgs and attend a comic book convention, where they run into some familiar faces.
episodes.title: Convention Dimension

episodes.synopsis: While Drew and Jo are experimenting with his new plant, they realize it can talk. Meanwhile, the Magnavors send a plant monster to Hillhurst.
episodes.title: Root of All Evil

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Von Frankenbeans arrives at Hillhurst and begins bossing Flabber and the other house monsters around.
episodes.title: The Doctor Is In

episodes.synopsis: Thinking they are Earthlings, the Magnavors attack two aliens who try to communicate with them.
episodes.title: Space Case

episodes.synopsis: The kids and house monsters discover an electronic brain device that causes the things you fear to materialize right before your eyes.
episodes.title: The Brain in the Attic

episodes.synopsis: When Drew, Jo and Roland go to Hillhurst on Halloween as trick-or-treaters, Frankenbeans is so intrigued with the idea that he sneaks out to explore.
episodes.title: Bye, Bye Frankie

episodes.synopsis: Flabber hosts a special breakfast for everyone at Hillhurst. Miffed that there is no blood, Fangula storms off and bites Van and Trip.
episodes.title: Fangs Over Charterville

episodes.synopsis: When Vexor gets away with a piece of Drew's Beetleborg armor, the Beetleborgs head to Hillhurst, hoping Flabber can fix it.
episodes.title: Curse of the Shadow Borg

episodes.synopsis: With the kids stripped of their Beetleborg powers, the Shadow Borg and the Magnavors wreak havoc.
episodes.title: The Rise of the Blaster Borg

episodes.synopsis: When the Shadow Borg triumphs over the White Blaster Beetleborg, the kids realize that they must retaliate.
episodes.title: The Revenge of Vexor

episodes.synopsis: Vexor's monsters are consumed by jealousy over the Shadow Borg, the key to Vexor's escape from the comics into the real world.
episodes.title: A Friend in Need

episodes.synopsis: The kids and the gang at Hillhurst have fleas! Not only that, they're still "itching" to find a way to get rid of the Shadow Borg.
episodes.title: Raiders of the Tomb

episodes.synopsis: Vexor throws down the gauntlet and challenges the BeetleBorgs to a fight -- Shadow Borg vs. Blue Mega Beetleborg.
episodes.title: Big Rumble in Charterville

episodes.synopsis: When the kids are assigned to do group reports on a historical figure, Drew and Roland choose Blackbeard the Pirate.
episodes.title: Yo Ho Borgs

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas approaches, Flabber recruits the house monsters to decorate the Hillhurst House and soon finds out that gifts and trees are being stolen.
episodes.title: Christmas Bells and Phasm's Spells

episodes.synopsis: Things get hairy when the terrible trio decides to cause a little "pet mischief" by kidnapping all the pets in town.
episodes.title: Pet Problems

episodes.synopsis: When the Phantom of the Opera shows up needing a place to stay, the lonely visitor turns his affections toward Jo.
episodes.title: Phantom of Hillhurst

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Frankenbeans returns to Hillhurst to repair young Frankenbeans' defective brain and turns him into a genius.
episodes.title: Operation Frankenbeans

episodes.synopsis: Flabber, the house monsters and the kids try to save Mums when he gets "mum-napped" by the same archaeologist who originally found the tomb.
episodes.title: The Curse of Mums' Tomb

episodes.synopsis: Old man Hillhurst returns to his old home. There's only one glitch... he wants Flabber and the gang out right away!
episodes.title: This Old Ghost

episodes.synopsis: When the house monsters can't agree on which of them is the scariest, Flabber scares up a frightening contest.
episodes.title: Jo's Strange Change

episodes.synopsis: It's Wolfgang's favorite time of the month, a full moon, and the other house monsters are trying to prevent Wolfgang from getting out.
episodes.title: She-Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Trip and Van plan to become famous by catching the legendary fish named Charterville Charlie.
episodes.title: Something Fishy

episodes.synopsis: When Baron Von Frankenbeans pieces together a bride for young Frankenbeans and brings her to life, the terrible trio schemes to ruin the wedding.
episodes.title: The Bride of Frankenbeans

episodes.synopsis: Flabber is upset that he might lose his roommate, Fangula, since he's been neglecting his vampire duties.
episodes.title: Fangula's Last Bite

episodes.synopsis: While Mums and Fangula argue over which of them is scarier, Wolfie searches Flabber's book for a spell to switch people's bodies.
episodes.title: The Good, the Bad and the Scary

episodes.synopsis: Vexor commands Combat Gnat to spy on Hillhurst when Flabber brings a teletransport machine from an old drawing to life.
episodes.title: Buggin' Out

episodes.synopsis: While spying on Hillhurst, Vexor sees the hungry house monsters chasing the kids and decides they'd make great Magnavors.
episodes.title: Svengali, by Golly

episodes.synopsis: A series of mysterious happenings at Hillhurst turn the house monsters into a bunch of superstitious ghouls.
episodes.title: Big Bad Luck

episodes.synopsis: Jara, Noxic and Typhus leave an unusual baby on the Hillhurst doorstep. When Mums discovers him, suddenly the entire household is talking like babies.
episodes.title: A Monster Is Born

episodes.synopsis: Norman, the new nerd in Jo's class, claims to be from a family of vampire hunters and says he must get rid of Fangula.
episodes.title: Norman Nussbaum: Vampire Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Flabber is determined to turn his hideous housemates into healthy hard-bodies. Enter Noxic's little brother: Super-Noxic.
episodes.title: Brotherly Fright

episodes.synopsis: The author of "Fright Files" thinks that Hillhurst would be a great inspiration for his work and moves in.
episodes.title: Fright Files

episodes.synopsis: Wolfgang's recurring daydream of causing a mutiny becomes reality when Wolfie accidentally returns Flabber to the pipe organ.
episodes.title: Borgslayer

episodes.synopsis: The Beetleborgs take a beating from Borgslayer and finally escape to Hillhurst, where they must rescue Flabber.
episodes.title: Vexor's Last Laugh

episodes.synopsis: When Nukus defeats the Beetleborgs, only their civilian powers remain.
episodes.title: Crush of the Crustaceans

episodes.synopsis: There's a riot at Charterville Prison when the kids try to ward off the Crustacean soldiers.
episodes.title: Metallix Rising

episodes.synopsis: The Beetleborgs retreat from the Worm Tank only to encounter Nukus, Horribelle and Vilor, so they transform into bugs to escape.
episodes.title: Battle Station Alert

episodes.synopsis: Nukus has Les create Aqualungs, a beast who leeches into the water system at Hillhurst.
episodes.title: Ghoul Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Nukus releases Les Fortunes' latest creation, Hagfish of Gar, a fish-like creature.
episodes.title: Totally Slammin' Sector Cycles

episodes.synopsis: Drew, Jo and Roland meet up with the Headless Horseman, who is en route to Hillhurst to swipe heads.
episodes.title: Headless over Heels

episodes.synopsis: Nukus has Les create Chameleon Monster to capture Flabber and steal the power of the Beetleborgs.
episodes.title: Monster Imposter

episodes.synopsis: Flabber and the House Monsters turn Hillhurst into "The Horror Hotel" to raise money for renovations.
episodes.title: Horror Hotel

episodes.synopsis: Nukus is unhappy with Les Fortunes' latest drawings and orders him to create new monsters.
episodes.title: Les Is More

episodes.synopsis: Norma Des-Doom, an old horror movie actress, visits her biggest fan, Fangula, at Hillhurst.
episodes.title: Sunset Boo-Levard

episodes.synopsis: A National Inquisitor reporter named Iris arrives in Charterville to expose the true identities of the Beetleborgs.
episodes.title: Extra... Beetleborgs Revealed

episodes.synopsis: A Transylvanian bounty hunter named Deadly Nightshade is after Little Ghoul, who took the witch's magic stirring stick.
episodes.title: Who's That Ghoul?

episodes.synopsis: Nukus is angry when publisher Rudy McDougal refuses to devote a comic book to his new Brain Sucker monster.
episodes.title: Attack of the Brain Suckers

episodes.synopsis: When Little Ghoul's uncle, the Grim Reaper, comes to town, she tells everyone that Reaper is retiring and needs a replacement.
episodes.title: Don't Fear the Reaper

episodes.synopsis: Nukus has a special portrait of Flabber sent to him, and before long, Flabber starts turning old and gray.
episodes.title: The Old Gray Flabber

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Frankenbeans sends his youngest son, Frankie, to stay with his older brother, Frankenbeans, at Hillhurst.
episodes.title: Son of Frankenbeans

episodes.synopsis: Little Ghoul says she's bored and Flabber is bewildered about how to keep her entertained.
episodes.title: How Does Your Garden Grow?

episodes.synopsis: Mums' mom arrives at Hillhurst and gives Mums a beautiful and powerful ancient ring. When Les tries but fails to steal the ring, Nukus appears.
episodes.title: The Curse of the Mummy's Mommy

episodes.synopsis: It's the resident monsters' favorite holiday -- Halloween -- and they plan to celebrate by snacking on unsuspecting trick-or-treaters.
episodes.title: Halloween Haunted House of Horrors

episodes.synopsis: The resident monsters are having terrible nightmares and Flabber suspects the Booger Man is responsible.
episodes.title: Booger Man

episodes.synopsis: A raven announces the arrival of Edgar Allan Poe, whose presence seems to inspire several strange events.
episodes.title: The Poe and the Pendulum

episodes.synopsis: When Les is pressured by Nukus to create bigger and better monsters, he recalls the first comic he and his brother Art ever drew together.
episodes.title: The Lost Comic

episodes.synopsis: The kids recover some of the astral coins from the comic book Nukus has stolen, then hide all but one of them.
episodes.title: Enter the Dragonborg

episodes.synopsis: When the astral coins turn out to be missing, Flabber suggests they call a psychic, Madame Myra, to find them.
episodes.title: To Foretell the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Wolfie gets the opportunity to accompany the Beetleborgs on a mission -- in exchange for an astral coin.
episodes.title: Wolfie's Wild Ride

episodes.synopsis: Fangula has tired himself out and needs rest. Soon he has the entire Hillhurst household attending to his every whim.
episodes.title: Lady and the Champ

episodes.synopsis: Nukus captures Flabber with Les' escape-proof Phasm Containment Unit and holds him ransom for the astral goods.
episodes.title: Astral Ransom

episodes.synopsis: The house monsters are fed up with the astral war and decide to offer Nukus the last one of the coins to protect them.
episodes.title: Astral Ambush

episodes.synopsis: The kids are inserting the coins into the sword, while at the Crypt, Les is disguising himself to get the goods from them.
episodes.title: Roboborg

episodes.synopsis: RoboBorg tells the kids that they have the power to turn their bikes into Mega Sector Spectra Cycles!
episodes.title: Mega Spectra Beetleborgs

episodes.synopsis: The war is on, and the Beetleborgs practice with RoboBorg to prepare themselves for Mega Nukus and Mega Vilor.
episodes.title: Battle of the Giants

episodes.synopsis: Flabber and the kids catch legendary animal trapper Jean Claude Pierre setting werewolf traps outside Hillhurst.
episodes.title: Robo Rumble

episodes.synopsis: When Flabber makes Fangula think he possesses superpowers, our fanged friend decides to attack the Crustaceans and Boron!
episodes.title: Super Fang

episodes.synopsis: The house monsters have grown restless waiting for the Beetleborgs to defeat Boron, so they recruit Dr. Von Frankenbeans.
episodes.title: Experiment in Evil

episodes.synopsis: The Crustaceans tap into Charterville's sewer system to pump toxic waste into the Crypt, where it morphs into a giant fire-breathing lizard.
episodes.title: Mega Borg Power
